Detailed Description

Global octree data -- one instance for whole octree.

Constant.

size_m >= 0
maxItemsPerCell_m >= 1
maxLevel_m >= 0 and <= MAX_LEVEL
minSize_m >= MIN_SIZE and <= size_m
